There was a twisted smile from DINOBOT, "As you orde=
r.  Terrorcons, come."  He signalled then, and grinned over at ANTAGONY, "A=
nd enjoy TARANTALUS mind drill."  

DINOBOT let the other PREDACONS form up=
 on him before mobilizing, "Will you be sending a technician out with us, C=
ommande,r or do you wish us to secure the area first before sending someone=
 along?"

Waiting for the response then before going to transform to his 'b=
east' mode and head off at a run then towards the target zone.  It would ei=
ther be glorious battle or tedious reconaissance, but as one said, war was =
one moment of fear and terror, and ninety nine moments of tedium backing it=
 up.
